title: What are the differences of psychology and parapsychology? - Quora

response.answer_text: 1.Psychology is a field of study and parapsychology is a field of study under psychology, i.e., parapsychology is a branch of Psychology. 2. Psychology deals with everything related to behaviour and mental processes whereas Parapsychology is specifically concerned with study of paranormal and psychic phenomena which include telepathy, precognition, clairvoyance, psychokinesis, near-death experiences, reincarnation, apparitional experiences, and other paranormal claims. It is identified as pseudoscience by a vast majority of mainstream scientists. Hope it clarifies your doubt.
